document_data.familyrefs: {{Cite organized play/LJ/A Gathering of Heroes Interactive}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Big Chief Bagoomba''' was the leader of the [[Tribe of Big Chief Bagoomba]], formerly the [[Saiyama]] tribe, that dwelt at the base of the [[Fire Mountain]] on the [[Malatran Plateau]], in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Big Chief Bagoomba was a narcissistic man with larger-than-life personality. His leadership was nothing but symbolic as the true behind-the-scenes ruler and manipulator was the clever [[Bengoukee]]. Bagoomba participated in the annual [[War Council]] only to partake in celebrations that followed.
